subject: Re: [junit] how to load faces-managed-beans.xml from JUnit Test cases
msgSnippet: Novin_b, ... There s a lot of dereferences in this line which could throw a NullPointerException.  Have you initialized the serviceLocator field? David Saff
messageBody:
Novin_b,

On Fri, Nov 14, 2008 at 1:51 AM, novin_b <novin_b@...> wrote:
> protected ServiceLocator serviceLocator; public void method(){ User
> user = this.serviceLocator.getUserService().login(this.username.trim
> (), this.password.trim()); }

There's a lot of dereferences in this line which could throw a
NullPointerException. Have you initialized the serviceLocator field?

David Saff
